Blog.post: I'm so proud. My friends sister is my sisters friend right? Well anyway she told me I was really nice for a year 8 and I FEEL PROUD!..lol Im so happy as well..lol..yip-ee...then later she told me I was her idol...how nice:) and sweet...haha..im telling the whole world about ME..maan i feel so gay right now..and really retarded and stupid. LoL! HeH HeH..Im bored again..thats why im making a entry in this thingo. Well at least im not pissed..well i was before because SOMEONE told SOMEBODY ELSE all this stuff about me liking them and argh! Just pissed me off so I ignored them after a while..how nice of me.. Grr..Im so retarded now...and so stupid as well... Anyway..bybyes..nite nite

Im bored...and tired..hmm..i feel like chocolate.. GIVE ME SOMETHING TO DO!...no one is online except for people who make me feel more stupid than i already am..with their EYE-ROLLING and their DOTTING...argh..i hate dots........................................................................................ <- how ugly r those dots... i hate dots by themselves though when someone just goes '...' cause it just tix me off.. argh..well bye

Hey! I made up a new word accidently! ...heh heh... My new word is 'CROGG' and its another meaning of shit. How cool is that? I didnt mean to make it up..i was supposed to spell gross and i didnt know what i was doing and ended up spelling CROGG on MSN. Im proud you know? I made up the meaning today as well which is good as well. I think im gonna have a haircut tomorrow..the dickhead that cut my hair last time was stupid and stuffed it up...how stupid...what a dumbarse..i reckon he's gay as well..anyway back to my new word...i made it up! lol..yay..im gonna just make this entry short and sweet so anyway..bye..

Argh! *grumble..grumble* Im tired again but not pissed off (suprise suprise!). well thats definately a BIG change in me.. oh my gawdness(haha...a new word created by ME!)... we have this ugly scary looking frog that we've had for a while now..maybe a few few months. anyway my sister fully loved it and fully thought it was like the best thing and I wanted to flush it down the toilet...god it looked gross and so green. it would always look at me with those goggly looking eyeballs and thinking of killing me with that puny little brain of its... i wanted to call it stinky but my stupid sisters wanted to call it something else 'prettier'. i wanted to call it something that the frog can relate to so the first word that popped into my dull tiny brain was 'STINKY!'. but hey! if they didnt like that name there would always be 'smelly'. well i havent looked at that frog again but if i do..id KILL IT! haha...evil me:( well...anyway..yesterday my sisters looked for the frog when my mum asked if the frog was dead yet...and they that they couldnt find the frog! MY WISHED HAVE BEEN GRANTED! wel...now what happened to the frog then? These are a few of my own theories: 1. The frog melted 2. The frog ran away 3. The frog died and ran away 4. Because i have special magic POWERS! kapow kapow...well my MAGIC SPELL turned the frog into a leaf 5. The frog became too skinny that it escaped and got accidently flushed down the toilet 6. The frog's friend did some kinda little spell that made the frog dissapear out of thin air 7. My mum killed it 8. My mum dropped it down the drain 9. My stupid sisters ate ..accidently 10. I was sleep walking and i killed it well it doesnt matter! ITS GONE! KA-POOF! the frog is gone...ill just go do a little happy dance...lol..yay! YA-HOO! HEH HEH! byes! ;)

Now Im more pissed off than ever! Far out! Bloody hell! I was supposed to send a song to Jeffrey but my computer kept on stuffing up and ARGH IM SO PISSED OFF! Well i guess im gonna die now because he didnt get it. SOMEONE SLAP ME! well..I wanted him to get the song but nooo my dumbarse computer stuffs up so much that whenever it is just about to almost sort of finish...THE COMPUTER STUFFS UP!..:'(..you dont know how annoying it is..i wanna seriously kill my computer............... ARGH! DIE COMPUTER DIE! MWAHAHA... im so evil now. maaaan..far out..well anyway something thats better is that you know my star sign bracelet thing that i tried to make?..well yay! It worked out alright but it sorta looks demented but i dont care because i know i made it so im really happy! but this is like one of my most greatest achievements! im happy with that though. i love it. its beautiful. its still sorta demented but i love it anyway. im just repeating myself but oh well...ill repeat myself again. I LOVE IT EVEN THOUGH IT LOOKS DEMENTED..they're supposed to look like circles but i made it look like rectangles..how good am i?;)i love it i love it i love it. did you know my name means honey bee?..how cute and sweet. im evil though so duno why my parents called me melissa..hmm... ..well bybyes! gee..im still pisssed off again..damn shit..well im always pissed off so that makes no difference. bye!

AHH! i cant read chinese! Im making this bracelet thing that you have to make and i wanted to have a go so i got it and the stupid thing has its instructions in CHINESE! how am i supposed to read?..someone help me:(.. maan oh well..ill just stuff it up.. tell you how me and my thingy goes..stupid shit..i wanna kill everything without english instructions and im listening to some song called 'learn chinese' .. how convenient..stupid song..its making me feel bad! the guys speaking some canto in it. stupid thing. well at least its got most of it in english and now AHH! he's fully speaking chinese..oh well..now he shutup and is speaking english again. im boring you all...im boring myself..ill go now and stuff up my bracelet.

I'm feeling all nigelated again. No ones chatting to me on MSN probably ignoring me or something..no wait! Someone is now..yay..lol;) Well im happy again and tired...Guess what? I have something else to do than post shit on this now. I'm all happy again..even better. My friend..KELVIN IF YOUR READING THIS BUT I DOUBT IT..well he thinks this is a loada shit and i dont blame him. poor guy. he's gone a bit odd nowadays i reckon. well he wont read this because he still thinks its all shit crap and hates this stupid dumbarse blog and yet i dont blame him again...sometimes i worry about him. he has gone all different and i dont quite like it..to tell you the truth. sometimes he is just so different from when he used to be that i just wanna POKE HIM and i know he really hates that. i just wanna poke someone now..wheres my stupid dumbarse sisters?...oh yeah..sleeping.. omigod..now everyone talks to me..all at the same time as well. everyones telling me that im retarded...like i needa noe... dammit..well i better not talk now or else ill get myself into lots of trouble..so me quiet now..bybyes..before i go saying something stupid again..byes again..;)

Hey! Today i actually got off my fat arse and did something..I went to the city with some friends and I have gotta say that I suck at that DDR dancing thingo in Galaxy World. You have no idea how bad I am...I fully stuff up everything so I just stand there while the music is playing...how retarded can i get?..seriously...but either way..it was funny. im such a bad friend as well..i was too busy trying to shoot down some of those dinosaurs with those funny looking gun things and my friend left and i didnt say bye... how mean am i?..well i didnt know she was going. maaan.. those songs on that thing are stuck in my head now. em>da dar dee dum dar dee dum dar dee dum... Yeah well I'll shutup now. I watched Mean Girls the movie. Whaa..it was alright..not the best but it was pretty good. WELL THATS WHAT I THINK. Maaan I seriously suck at that dancing thing. I'll never get over it.I played like..over five times as well..stupid shit. the first time i played i wanted to play with my friend but it didnt work so we asked the guy and his like 'sorry i cant help you' ... dumb bastard..i call him a bastard now...he was looking at me funny as well. GOD..WHAT A DICKHEAD THOUGH!...makes me sick. talking about sick...before i was gonna leave i played the dancing thingo and again and stuffed it up again and i swear..i was gonna spew...vomit..barf..whatever you people call it. but i was gonna ''errkk''. Bloody shit..who cares? I SHOT DINOSAURS...how good am i?;) and i did that racing thing and crashed every second i got..damn car thing. but im proud cause i didnt do as bad as i didnt last time but i did pretty pretty pretty bad..damn that. i was swearing and screaming in the thing because those dinosaur things were pretty scary. maan..i hope no one heard. it would be funny if someone did hear though;):D well thats mighty good for me isnt it? my friend knocked down one of those cardboard model things in the cinema place...it was funny...almost squished me though. we smuggled food in the cinema's as well..but dont tell anyone...maaan if i keep eating ill be the size of an airballon in a matter of no time!! damn..oh well... but those people in the cinema wouldnt shutup! i swear that girl next to us wouldnt stop laughing during the ads before the movie and stuff..i just wanted to go up to her and tell her to SHUT THE FUCK UP!..stupid bitch whore.. hah..we went shopping and my legs really hurt now... my top kept 'almost' falling off and it was pissing me off.. my frend had the same size top and her one wasnt going all crazy like mine...dumb top..it cant even act like a top...ooohh maaan..i should have gotten new clothes as well but noooo my friend wanted to go wherever she wanted to go..oh yeah..galaxy world..galaxy world my arse... everyone there hogs everything and theres that bastard guy working there... and now i've gone all obsessed over fucking lipgloss..i got 7lip glosses today and eyeshadow..how pathetic is that?...pretty dumb i reckon... im just here complaining like the little baby i am and i was dying in galaxy world like the useless creature shit i am too...i seriously suck..you have no idea how much i suck..its really bad..its tooooo hard for me..even the begginner the begginner is like sooooo fast for me...they should have a baby begginner level.. you know what? i got at market city at like 10:15pm and no one was there! i waited and waited until 10:30 (when everyone was supposed to be there) and no one was there...maaan i was even more pissed...im always pissed off actually but at the end of the day i was too cold to be pissed off anymore... the movie i watched was pretty good..i was kinda shocked when the Regina girl got hit my the bus...fuck i was like..SHIT WHAT WAS THAT? and half a second later i realised it was a bus..but now im just ruining it for you so i better shutup about that.. i sure talk alot..i had more to say though..now what was it? oh yeah more complaining..whats stupid is that everyone hogs everything everywhere..also kinda pisses me off..pissing..lol..during the movie i needed to go to the toilet but i dont think you peoples need to know that but I'll tell you anyway. i needed to go to the toilet when it was not really but kinda the end of the movie so i asked my friend to come and because im such a nice girl i decided to crawl on the floor so i wouldnt piss anyone off by ruining their stupid movie so i crawled on the floor and started laughing..how dumb..well my friend just got up and walked around as if no one was in the cinema's but it was pretty packed. and well i bet those people would have been pretty pissed off but who cares..not like im ever gonna see them again or like they can kill me. on the topic of killing..i wanted to kill my friend today for coming like an hour late...far out..making me wait even longer than i had to wait... that song from DDR is still in my head...well i better shutup again..im cold and tired...i had more to say but i cant rememba...oh yea i was pissed off again because i wanted to get something but they didnt have MY STAR SIGN..libra.. DAMN SHIT...now im sad...but doesnt matter... ill go now..let you people if there are any people reading this to go to bed..sleeeep... hehe but me had a really great time today..which is good to hear or else all you'd be hearing from me is all this loada shit and complaing but all of this is a loada shit and a hell of a lotta complaing..shit..oh well.. goodnight sweet dreams..bye 4 now...;)

Hi again! Im bored again so Im posting for I hope the last time all night seeing as this is the seventh time ive posted. Well 'HI JEFFREY! IM BORED! SO HOW R U? GOOD? WELL I AM..BUT BORED..IM GONNA GO ALL GRUMPY SOON IF SOMEONE DOESNT GIVE ME SOMETHING TO DO!' and please...no one go thinking its Jeffrey Poo cause MWAHAHA..ITS A DIFFERENT JEFFREY! ...stupid philip..pisses me off ...yea well that was a message to jeffrey...haha...'HI EVERYONE ELSE AS WELL;)'..and that was a message to everyone else. OMG listen to this: There as this guy who had 2 daughters. His first daughter drowned and he got $5000 insurance money for it. And he was like woah, SO much money. So he bought his second daughter tonnes of insurance and bought lots of house insurance. He waited until midnight, pour oil around his daughter's bed and house and set it on fire. And he killed his daughter, just so he could get insurance money. What a TWISTED RETARD! how pathetic and stupid can you get? Im retarded and I wouldnt even do that! stupid shit. The guy should go to jail and they should feed him rotten cheese, lettuce and shit and feed him cow piss. After he dies he should rot in hell...he killed his only last daughter for insurance money..dumb arsehole..stupid shit..DIE! DIE! DIE! makes me sick..dumb fuckhed he is...oh well This sucks...damn shit..crap..well bye..goodnight sweet dreams goodnite again...

Yeah well this is the like..sixth time im posting to my dumbarse blog... well anyway about how I said that I wanted to be depressed..well i take that back..my friend just read this stupid blog when i thought no one would read it. her names jacqie well anyway jaquie had wanted to slit her wrists and commit suicide so she told her mum n stuff so she went to the docter and anyway they gave her anti-depression pills (what a convenient name...) and she took em and now she is a-ok...poor girl..well anyway I DUN WANA B DEPRESSED..but i still wana noe what it feels like.. yup yup..but im happy now ;) im not as bored anymore that Im talking to myself again..i wonder if anyone is gonna read this..i bet my arse on it.. well helo jeffrey if your reading this...doubt it...but hi anyway..and hi to everyone else as well...this is soooo stupid..im getting more and more retarded every second...in a year ill b walking on my fucking head.

iiiiiimmmm baaaaack!! MWAHAHAHAHA! Evil me is back......... Ha-Ha-Ha-Ha-Ha...so wassup? Life isnt as boring as usual because I have something to think about now..but I'd rather not share it out loud.. so life's ok again.. ups and downs..round and rounds... WOW! LOL! i just rhymed! Im a poet and i didnt even notice..maybe because im dumb:(..well who cares? I RHYMED! LOOK! HAR-HAR! arent i the funny one at the moment?..guess so..lol..im proud baAAHHH...lol...i feel stupid now..im larfing at myself..lol..silly dumbarse me.... somethings happened..i cant say..but somethings happened n i duno what to do..i hope people arent reading this..but what the hECK.. READ ME!..lol...well bybyes... ill talk 2 myself again soon;)

Maaaann..I just realised how low and sad and stupid I could get and how sad my stupid life could get. Like seriously..here I am..just typing away updating my blog for my like...fifth time today because Im jussstt so bored and how pathetic can i get? I HAVE A BLOG FOR GODS SAKE! doesnt that tell you how retarded i am?..well ill tell you again that im retarded...this is stupid.. god..im making myself feel bad again..but i deserve it so ill keep telling myself im retarded...nah...too lazy..better shutup now..:(

God im bored again so all I do is post..Im hungry..Why isn't anyone online? I want this blog all to myself and I will because no one will read my deep and darkest thoughts and secrets. Well Ill feed your mind with my new deep..dark secret ..ok well...here it goes...its coming..ok here ill say it now..im hungry..god im hungry..its like 7pm and im really hungry...all this talking is making me really hungry..I feel like..water and a lollipop..now thats what i call food..yuummmm..... mmmmmmmmmmmmmm...lollipop..man..im gona make myself drool soon...you see what i do to myself? i make myself go all weird...no wonder people thinnk im craazy.. *sighs* im bored... *sighs again* why am i so nigelated right now? *sighs the longest sigh i can sigh* maan does life suck for me right now... *sighs 5seconds longer than last sigh* *sighs again in satisfaction of last sigh* my sighing is pissing me off again...stupid me.. ah crap well bye!

Wow...It is pretty..I'm feeling nigelated again because no one is talking to me. I don't quite feel like bitching about people now. Ill bitch about them when I'm pissed off. YaY! My friends birthday thingo is tomorrow and I'm invited! Yeess..something good to do in the holidays at least. So what have you been doing in the holidays? I havent been doing much. Just laughing at other people and stuff. I was reading someone elses blog this morning and they girl there is actually quite strange but entertaining. She's weirder than me. She said this (and I quote): 'Don't you think cokaroaches are so sexy? I want to go molest one right now. They so shiny and musky and brown and yummy and crunchy... mmmm reminds me of chocolate....' I swear! I was laughing my arse off when I read that..hah..how retarded some people like me can be. I'm thirsty..after all that talking and laughing..I want a drink but Im tooo lazy to get one. So im like one big lazy retard. One day someone who is capable of murder will hunt me down and murder me because they couldnt stand me anymore..Im soo annoying that I feel bad. I piss myself off..I piss my friends off..I piss my parents off..i piss everyone off. I master PISSING OFF and i always get pissed off myself. Whats wrong with me? Its probably my retardness talking. I always talk so much..just reminds me. I HATE MONKEYS!!! ARGH! *scrunches up face* I hate monkeys..and their big heads..ears..pink arse..and deformed looking body. Who said we evolved from apes? God..they have problems..Monkeys just piss me off so much but OMG they other day i was shopping with my friend and i found this top which had this monkey holding out flowers and it said 'Wanna hug? Get in line!' But omigod I was going to get it! It looked so cute and the monkey didnt even show its arse..thankgod as well..I could have fainted if it did..well I didnt get the top but I ended up getting a pretty pink one. Makes me happy just thinking about it. My friend's obsessed with his fucking monkeys. I wanna kill a monkey. I used to like donkeys as well. I loved donkeys..specially you know the 'Winnie the Pooh Bear' donkey..whats his name?..Oh yea 'Eeyore'! He always looks so old and tired and ugly but he was sooo cute!! Ahh..doesnt matter..Im over the whole donkey thing. Maaaan I just realised that I talk even more than I realised.. I think Ive told you all that Im retarded so I'll tell you again...IM RETARDED:( Its depressing you know? I always feel retarded. Shame on me. I might be depressed. I want to be depressed. Try new things. I wanna be depressed. How do you know if your depressed or not? Well I want to be depressed. And once I am weally weally weally depressed I'll just call the kids helpline;) Im a genius...a retarded genius. I've always wanted to call the kids helpline number. I always wanted to lie about one of my problems and get free advice but I didnt because I think I was juuust tooo lazy. Im a lazy retard. No one is talking to me on MSN now..I feel nigelated again. im like a N-I-G-E-L... Makes me feel bad. Well posting this is making me feel more gay. im not gay..just makes me feel dumb again...haahhhh..I bet all you people reading this would have fallen asleep..listening to my shit of a mouth going on and on and drowning out everything... well i better do you all a favour and shutup.. WELL FAREWELL! tata! byes

Hi! Hi! Hi! My very first post. Damn Im proud. Im bored as well..who cares?! Ive got something to do now dont I? Me and my BLOG! mwahahahaha! I wonder if this thing actually works..well who cares?! Im just gonna talk anyway like some crazy bitch. People actually do think Im crazy. My friend told me today that he thought that i was crazy like 'mentally insane' sort of crazy and then he said he was crazy too but I was crazier..I must be like the craziest person in the world:( He also told me I should be proud but I just cant be proud...ITS NOT NORMAL TO BE MENTALLY INSANE!! how can I feel proud? It's like I laugh a lot, joke a lot and talk a lot but does that mean Im crazy? Well maybe they have their reasons... It's not like I'm capable of killing someone..(like my other friend said he can..freaky..now I'm scared of him..sorta)I DONT WANNA BE CRAZY! Well I might be crazy but I am also a very boring person as well..:( thought you peoples ought to know that..and Im not proud of that as well:( I feel retarded at the moment and really stupid and dumb. Maybe cause I am. No one is talking to me on MSN now..I feel nigelated. Stupid me. I should be happy because It's the school holidays! YaY! ..stayed home today though..lucky me huh?:P Well I guess I should be glad that Im away from 'evil school' and specially my english teacher. OhMyGod! He is insane and really evil as well...It's like assignment after assignment and he really does suck! If you dont hand in you assignment in on the due date he goes BALISTIC! and he screams at you for about 10 minutes and does that each to everyone who didnt give in their assignment and then for about 15minutes he screams at the whole class for all out lazy work and he goes all weird. Once when he read out a poem some dickhead in my class screamed out that the poet was gay..lol. Anyway the teacher went extra crazy and started shouting at everyone and calling everyone a bunch of homophobes. How retarded is he? I reckon he's gay himself and doesnt want other people talking about 'gayness'. I feel dumb again...here I am practially talking to myself like the moron I am...Oh well....YaY! someone's talking to me on MSN! LOL! Guess I am not quite nigelated. Damn..dickhead has nothing to say. Shouldnt call him that because he's my friend but he's changed since. Stupid changed dickhead. Nah..shouldnt call him that neither. NOW HE'S SIGNING IN AND OUT IN AND OUT!NOW IM EVEN MORE PISSED OFF!! Oh look..someone else is chatting to me..coool.. lol..this is how retarded I am... Well bybyes! Ill post again in like a while..I just wanna see how this turns out;)
